Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: trash
Description: Trash, move files/folders to the trash

Arguments.Name: v
Arguments.Description: Print verbose output while moving items

Arguments.Name: F
Arguments.Description: Use the Finder API to move items to the trash

Arguments.Name: s
Arguments.Description: Securely empty the trash. trash asks for confirmation executing this action. If this argument is used, no need to be specified

Arguments.Name: y
Arguments.Description: Skips the confirmation prompt for -e and -s. CAUTION: permanently instantly
